Class AbiturientDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • by.zhukova.uni.db.AbstractDAO<Abiturient>
      • by.zhukova.uni.db.AbiturientDAO

  • public class AbiturientDAO
extends AbstractDAO<Abiturient>
    Class AbiturientDAO (data access object) is designed to work with database table abiturients and Abiturient objects.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Natallya Zhukova
